title: The Saga Begins
lyrics:
[intro, single strum]
A (G)long, (D)long (Em)time ago
(Am)In a galaxy (C)far away
Na(Em)boo was under an (D)attack
And (G)I thought (D)me and (Em)Qui-Gon Jinn
Could (Am)talk the fede(C)ration in
To (Em)maybe cutting (C)them a little (D)slack
 
(Em) But their response, it (Am)didn't thrill us
(Em) They locked the doors and (Am)tried to kill us
(C)We es(G)caped from (Am)that gas
Then (C)met Jar Jar in (D)Boss Nass
 
We (G)took a (D)bongo (Em)from the scene
And we (Am) went to Theed to (D)see the Queen
We (G)all wound (D)up on (Em)Tatooine
That's (C)where we (D7)found this (G)boy (C-G)
 
[chorus, normal strum]
Oh! (G)My (C)my this here (G)Anakin (D)guy
Maybe (G)Vader someday (C)later now he's (G)just a small (D)fry
He (G)left his (C)home and kissed his (G)mommy good(D)bye
Saying (Em)"Soon I'm gonna be a Je(A7)di"
(Em)"Soon I'm gonna be a Je(D)di" (D7)
 
[drum start]
(G) Did you know this (Am)junkyard slave isn't (C)even old e(Am)nough to shave
(Em) But he can use the (D)Force, they say (D)
Ahh, do (G)you see (D)him hitting (Em)on the queen
Though (Am)he's just nine and (C) she's fourteen
Yeah, (Em)he's probably gonna (A7) marry her (D)someday (D)
[single strum]
Well, I (Em)know he built C-(D)3PO
And I've (Em) heard how fast his (D)pod can go
[normal strum]
And (C)we were (G)broke, it's (A7)true, so we (C)made a wager or (D7)two
He was a (G)prepu(D)bescent (Em)flying ace
And the (Am)minute Jabba started (C)off that race
Well, (G)I knew (D)who would (Em)win first place
Oh (C)yes, it (D7)was our (G-)boy (-C)
(G) We started (D7)singing
 
[chorus]
(G)My (C)my this here (G)Anakin (D)guy
Maybe (G)Vader someday (C)later now he's (G)just a small (D)fry
He (G)left his (C)home and kissed his (G)mommy good(D)bye
Saying (Em)"Soon I'm gonna be a Je(A7)di"
(Em)"Soon I'm gonna be a Je(D)di" (D7)
 
Now we (G)finally got to (Am)Coruscant
The (C)Jedi Council (Am)we knew would want
To (Em) see how good the (D)boy could be (D)
So we (G)took him (D)there and we (Em)told the tale
How his (Am)midi-chlorians were (C) off the scale
And he (Em)mightâ€¦ ful(A7)fil that prophe(D)cy (D)
[single strum]
Oh the (Em) Council was im(D)pressed of course
Could (Em)he bring balance (D) to the Force?
[normal strum]
They (C)inter-(G)viewed the (A7)kid, (C)oh training they for-(D7)bid
Because (G)Yoda (D)sensed in (Em)him much fear
And (Am)Qui-Gon said "Now (C) listen here"
"Just (G)stick it (D)in your (Em) pointy ear"
"I (C)still will (D7)teach this (G-)boy" (-C)
(G) He was (D7)singing
 
[chorus]
(G)My (C)my this here (G)Anakin (D)guy
Maybe (G)Vader someday (C)later now he's (G)just a small (D)fry
He (G)left his (C)home and kissed his (G)mommy good(D)bye
Saying (Em)"Soon I'm gonna be a Je(A7)di"
(Em)"Soon I'm gonna be a Je(D)di" (D7)
 
[single strum]
(G) We caught a (D)ride back (Em)to Naboo
Cause (Am)Queen Amidala (C)wanted to
(Em) I frankly would've liked to (D)stay
(G)We all (D)fought in that (Em)epic war
And it (Am)wasn't long at (C)all before
Little (Em)hotshot flew his (C)plane and saved the (D)day
 
(Em) And in the end some (Am)Gungans died
(Em) Some ships blew up and some (Am)pilots fried
(C) A lot of (G)folks were (Am)croaking, the (C)battle droids were (D)broken
And the (G)Jedi (D)I ad(Em)mire most
Met (C)up with Darth Maul and (D7)now he's toast
Well, (G)I'm still (D)here and (Em)he's a ghost
I (C)guess I'll (D7)train this (G)boy
And I was (D7)singing
 
[chorus, slow strum]
(G)My (C)my this here (G)Anakin (D)guy
Maybe (G)Vader someday (C)later now he's (G)just a small (D)fry
He (G)left his (C)home and kissed his (G)mommy good(D)bye

Maybe (G)Vader someday (C)later now he's (G)just a small (D)fry
